description:
The concept of usability is directly tied to the success of websites and apps.
How easy are they to use? We'll learn in this course how to ensure users can
accomplish their goals on websites and apps, as well as laptops and mobile
devices. We'll also consider the user centered approach to design, highlight
common usability issues on sites and apps, and offer tips on how to ensure
your designs stay as usable as possible.
title: Usability Foundations
